episode_event_general_specialcos01/6701_: Young master! I think we’re ready to go!

Ready with the camera,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Good. Start rolling!
episode_event_general_specialcos01/6702_: Ahem! Sync pairs of Pasio, hear my words!

I’m happy to announce that we’ll be holding a
new kind of event to promote Pasio! We’re calling
it...the Battle of the Golden Spheres!
I’ll explain how it works, so listen up!

Yeah, and if you, like, still don’t get it after that,
we’ll tooootally answer any questions you’ve got
later on!

First, let’s give them an overview of the event.
Take it away, young master!
Certainly! Here are the rules!

We’ll start by creating two teams of sync pairs,
each led by two leaders in special costumes!

We’ll hide five golden spheres all over Pasio. The
team that brings more of these spheres back to
their camp wins the game!
It’s as simple as that!

You can also challenge your opponents to a
Pokémon battle before they get back to their camp
in order to steal their golden spheres!

Battle with honor! Show us your finest moves, and
try to take as many golden spheres from your
opponents as you can!

Uh...quick question! How’re the spectators gonna
know what’s going on if the battles are spread out
all over Pasio?

Excellent question! We’ll have cameras following
everyone around, so all battles will be
livestreamed with commentary!

Don’t forget that we’re trying to promote Pasio
with showy battles! How you make it a show is
completely up to you!

Winning isn’t enough to be a top-class sync pair!
You also have to make your battles entertaining!
Only the best know how to work an audience!

Also, keep in mind that we’ve designed this as a
team event! Coordinating with your teammates
is key!
Cooliooo. Thanks for that, Master Lear!

We’ve also prepared some special prizes for the
winning team, so sign up now to join the event!

One more question. How exactly are we going to
split all the participants into two teams?

Heh. I’ve already decided on themes for each
team! Everyone can join the team that suits
them the best.

I’ve already appointed the leaders that’ll head
each team! Two for each, in fact!

I chose them based on some rumors I heard—
that there are four Trainers who partnered up
with some interesting Pokémon here on Pasio!

From what I’ve seen, they all perfectly fit my
vision for each team’s theme!

I’ll even give everyone access to my wardrobe of
clothes from other regions! So be grateful!

The flashier your outfit, the better! These costumes
are going to help us keep Pasio in the spotlight!

Just wait until you see these team leaders in their
special costumes. It’ll blow you away!

Now then...[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Just like today, I’d like you to help with filming
when we hold this event!

Why are you so surprised? Today was enough of
a rehearsal, wasn’t it?

Not to worry! You won’t be the only one behind
the cameras out there!

I’ve arranged for a whole crew of sync pairs to
be out and about filming all these battles!

I even have other things planned, as well!
For example—
Young master! It’s time for your next appointment!
Already? But I’m not done yet!

Oh, all right! If you want to know what else we
have in store for this event, you can check it out
when it starts!

Okie dokie, that’s all for now! See you all on the
battlefield, everyone!

Buzzwole and I are gonna show ’em who’s boss!

Celesteela and I will protect our team with

event a success!

As a leader and an actress, I’ll do everything I

My job is to make this fun for everyone involved!

I’m not just gonna win—I’m gonna make winning
look good!
